website_summaries.verdict: A powerful pre-stacked choline supplement that's enhanced with a number of beneficial natural herbal extracts.
pros: Daily dosage delivers high-levels of Alpha GPC choline for fast, effective results
Includes numerous brain-boosting ingredients which have been shown to work well with choline
Specially formulated to improve mental clarity while reducing stress and anxiety
Earns praise for its ability to boost energy levels and mental acuity
cons: Might not be the best option if you’re looking for a pure choline supplement to create a tailored nootropic stack

customer_reviews.title: It really was quite amazing. I had brain fog before
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the difference within a few days of taking brain support. It really was quite amazing. I had brain fog before, just not feeling sharp or energetic. I have more energy and my thinking and cognitive processes are sharp. This is hard to explain. It's like my mind was full of cotton and now it is full of fresh air. I know that sounds strange, but it is really the only way I know to explain it. I love this product, am so happy I ordered, and will continue to buy it! I recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Deana DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Capsules were Black and Moldy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second bottle of Brain Support after loving my experience with the 1st bottle. The capsules came looking very different from the first. The first capsules were white and healthy looking, the second bottle came with black capsules and they were expanded and weeping. I have tried to contact the company several times, only to receive an answering service time and time again, no one ever responds to emails or phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend products easily
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed at just how effective this product has been working! My profession is in a demanding field that requires intense focus and energy for long periods of time. After just days of using it, my memory has been much stronger. Even my clarity and approach to projects has been notable. Started my wife on just today. I don't recommend products easily. Hands down.........AMAZING!! Thank you 1 BODY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Capsules look like a log of poop
customer_reviews.text: I just received my shipment and needless to say but very disappointed. Every capsule in the bottle is black, dried up and hardened. Will never order this again.
customer_reviews.author: todd moore

customer_reviews.title: Different color and size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a while now. I just got this new bottle today and I’m not too sure about. They are a different color and their bigger . I’ve tried to call their customer service several times with no luck no one seems to be able to answer my questionS. Update: I finally received an email . Thanks for your email and sorry for the confusion. There are often color variations within the natural herbal & botanical ingredients. This is 100% natural and nothing to be concerned about. Time of year of the harvest & the amount of nutrients in the soil can play a role as can simple natural color variations within the plant themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ibbitson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a serious migraine headache. My left temple was super sensitive to the touch for almost 2 days and felt bruised. Not sure from which ingredient it was from, or if it was the combination from all of them, but it didn’t agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Cali King

customer_reviews.title: Not what it was before.
customer_reviews.text: I got a terrible batch, each pill was extremely hard and when I was looking for an expiration date there wasn’t one!!!! I wasn’t even sure how old it was, but it made me feel WAY worse than before, even more brain fog and unfocused.
customer_reviews.author: Shakti Stones

customer_reviews.title: Helps thoughts flow easily
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is almost empty, Before this blended support I was taking most of the supplements in this mix solo which is cost prohibitive, I really like this brain support, only 3 capsules 1st thing in the morning with hot green tea for quick thinking and alertness all day, until I missed taking it this morning, I quickly realized that my competitive advantage was missing and a stress headache was present.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Schmoker

customer_reviews.title: Solid Formula, Helps with Focus
customer_reviews.text: Using it as recommended pre-workout supp, for brain cognition, clarity and focus. I like that it has Alpha GPC, bacopa and Lion's Mane all in the same formula. I will note that 1Body seems to strongly encourage, but not require, this review in order to get a free product from them, which does not make me happy, but this is my honest view of the product, it does seem good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: BRAIN AND WALLET SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: I was buying nootrops individually because I didn't think anyone could get great quality into a "formula" brand. But my wife did the research. This one bottle contained what I was taking in five different bottles. I was skeptical that it was all in there at the same quality and efficacy. But I tried it. Glad I did because I still got the same great clarity, focus, and no-fog-brain that I was spending a lot more for. Nootrops work and 1 Body actually put together a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ing

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Formula
customer_reviews.text: Aloha, This formula has all the needed ingredients put together for increasing brain function! Definitely notice an improvement. Another big plus is how clean it is. Vegetable capsule, which is made up of water and hypromellose. No stearates or silica's. As a nutritionist I have seen and tried just about every formula over the last 35 years, and this is one of the best! A hui ho....
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Actually helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually surprised by the effectiveness of it. I tried the product not expecting much in terms of results. But throughout the workday I find I am more focused the entire shift, and I drink less coffee, which has definitely been good for my digestive system. It seems to give me energy and mental alertness, which can be issues once you reach the age of 50.
customer_reviews.author: Derek880

customer_reviews.title: Focusing with ADD
customer_reviews.text: I have ADD and I was looking for an alternative product to Ritalin or Concerta that is more natural and less likely to require increasing dosage due to habituation. I use this product when I'm at work or when I need to focus on a project at home. On particularly hectic days I'll take one capsule with each meal, though usually I have one a day around lunch time when I need that extra boost of concentration and even keeled energy (from the Taurine). I am caffeine sensitive and I like that I can take this product later on in the day than I'm able to drink caffeine and still have an easy time going to sleep and sleep well.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: This product is uniquely fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I visit my local health store as much as anyone, and I have tried a few of these products in the past. A few have given me a noticeable amount of extra energy, and one or two had improved my memory. But, none of those did both. Not only did this product provide energy and improved memory, but also it seemed to increase clarity and focus. That is something I've never seen before. Truly, that was the stand out with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly unimpressed. I've separately tried some of the listed ingredients thinking combined in this supplement would be a power house but I'm left with really no noticable effect.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Trossbach

customer_reviews.title: Clean and affordable nootropic
customer_reviews.text: Nice, clean feeling of focus that lasts throughout the day. I study for many hours per day as a student and have been enjoying the boost this supplement has given me. It is not like a stimulant supplement but instead delivers a long lasting ability to focus and increased mental endurance
customer_reviews.author: OZZY

customer_reviews.title: SO VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time using such a supplement. I read mostly positive reviews from the multitude of happy customers and decided to purchase the product. I am now finished with half the bottle (two week usage) and have experienced not even the slightest change. I will finish the remainder of the bottle and hope that after four weeks, It will begin to impress with a positive change in results.
customer_reviews.author: M Flash

customer_reviews.title: Received an unsealed container
customer_reviews.text: I wax able to unscrew the lid without breaking the plastic...I had a feeling like "this opened too easy...what if it's tampered.." And then I pull the lid off to see that the Styrofoam seal was pulled halfway back.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Effective memory pills!
customer_reviews.text: I have re ordered this product already because it truly does what it says...it did improve my memory. My brain is sharper and I can retain information easy since I was using these pills. I've had major surgery in the past and took heavy pain meds which affected my memory. These pills improved my memory big time. I will keep using this product for its good benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Brain Support has almost all of the ingredients I am looking for in a supplement for a reasonable price, including one I had not tried before - Lion's Mane. I did get headaches for the first couple days, but it was short lived as I adjusted. I only take it during the week and notice a difference on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: works with no negative effects
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is different, so I eased into taking the brain support in order to find the right dose for myself. After finding my dosage (I only need 2 capsules to notice the effects), I take it as often as I feel my body needs it (sometimes able to skip a day). All in all, I haven't had any negative effects like I've had with other supplements for brain function. I like this one and will be continuing to stock it as part of my supplement regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The total benefit not just an individual benefit
customer_reviews.text: 2 year concussion affecting my balance, memory, concentration, focus, sensitivity to light, and other concussion symptoms. I have been involved in vestibular therapy and after adding 1 body"Brain Support" I can definitely feel progress and improvement across the board related to those issues I have had difficulty dealing with since before I started taking 1 body Brain Support. I am not being paid for this review. I researched several other brain support products and felt this product would be the one to help me the best. I am happy with my choice and until I do not feel continued improvement I will maintain my choice of the 1 body "Brain Support" product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: I believe this product is helping my ability to retrieve ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is helping my ability to retrieve information. It's hard to know always if it is the supplement, change of seasons, more sunlight, etc. that should get credit, but I have enough confidence in the product to continue taking it. I have had no negative effects. Possibly increased appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drop the Vitamin B
customer_reviews.text: The U.S. Recommended Dietary Allowance for B6 is 1.7 milligrams per day, and for B12 it’s 2.4 micrograms Taking this supplement as directed results in taking over 41 times your daily recommended dose of vitamin B12. Supplementing like this has been associated with a fourfold increase in incidence of lung cancer in men. It's unfortunate because the rest of this supplement is great, definitely the strongest brainboosting stack available on Amazon at this time. Don't contaminate an excellent brainboosting supplement stack with a potential carcinogen just because people are stupid and think that megadosing vitamin B is a good idea (it is not)
customer_reviews.author: average_consumer

customer_reviews.title: Helps me get through the week
customer_reviews.text: I have such brain fog and near dementia issues that it's hard for me to even know what day it is or remember things from one minute to the next without having to really concentrate and focus. Clearly, there is a bigger health issue, but until I can figure out what is at the root of that cause, Brain Support has helped tremendously to help me be able to work and still have a functionable life.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, includes important herbs not usually found in a supplement of this type to support healthy cognitive function
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a quality product and the company is more interested than most in having satisfied customers. I take several products to help maintain a healthy cognitive function, but this one includes a couple herbs not present in most the others I take. I believe it's important to supplement with the herbs included in this supplement and believe they contribute to better cognitive function.
customer_reviews.author: LC in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Package came with a plastic seal around the cap; however, the seal inside was already opened. I took it for a while to help with school but it only made me more tired. Did not notice a significant increase in concentration or memory whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: I have Fibromyalgia and a rare neurological condition called Idiopathic Intracranial Hypertension. The brain fog from both conditions is ridiculous. I was looking for a specific list of supplements that help with memory, focus, and cloudy thinking. I stumbled across this one by accident and was surprised and ecstatic to see that it had 4 out of the 5 supplements I was looking for, with the added bonus of B vitamins which help with energy. I bought it immediately. I could see a difference almost immediately. I have been taking it for several months now and if I miss a week, the difference is obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Kanieshia

customer_reviews.title: Better than taking drugs!
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent product. I have tried it before now, and I bought two bottles this time, one to share with my aging hubby, who is becoming very forgetful these days. I think it works better than the drugs they have out on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Not what they seem to be!
customer_reviews.text: These supplements cause my husband to have a severe headaches and also he did not find that they helped him at all for memory function or anything that was claimed
customer_reviews.author: callowac2

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Improve Memory & Boost Focus Is what the product is sold on, and it does just that. I like it, my memory has gotten alot better since I started 15 or so days ago. It did take a week or so, for me to take notice.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey G.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good....
customer_reviews.text: After about 12 days I saw some improvement with thought processing and I noticed more energy. Unfortunately I got bit by a deer tick and got Lyme disease. I just finished with the anibiotic and will resume taking Brain Support. I am looking forward to some great results! I am pleased that it has both B6 and B12 in it and happy with all the nutraceuticals they added in one formula.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: More like a diuretic than a supplement
customer_reviews.text: After taking this product, I frequently needed to empty my bladder about 5x/hr. I felt like having to urge to urinate constantly. This was disappointing as I had high hopes for this product after reading the fantastic reviews. However, everyone is different and each person will have different reactions to the same product. Due to the side effects, I am returning this product. Hopefully, I will be issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Effective with NO SOY!
customer_reviews.text: I have had poor memory my entire life, and '1 Body Brain Support Memory Supplent' really does seem to help, both short term and long term memory. This may be due to 1 Body Brain Support's wide assortment of ingredients which could enable it to be effective against a wider spectrum of causes for poor memory. NO SOY: Also important is that 1Body does NOT/NOT contain SOY, which has been alleged to be an estrogenic allergen.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: You have to take 3 capsules. Didn't work at all. Threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hall

customer_reviews.title: Forgot what?
customer_reviews.text: I seem to be remembering items, dates, times, and everyday better. I used to get stuck remembering the right word to use but now it just flows right in and I'm not stuck pondering as much.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Lo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ingredients for brain function
customer_reviews.text: Cannot yet say if this is working to lift brain fog or to help with the dizziness my husband has from a stroke he suffered, however this contains several ingredients known to be helpful & healthy for the brain so will take for 2 months to see if this helps. *Product arrived with a note saying second bottle was free so I'm now waiting for it to arrive since I went to the website as instructed & entered my Amazon order # then was told my 2nd bottle was on the way. I will update after taking the second free bottle.
customer_reviews.author: DLZ

customer_reviews.title: A Clearer Focus in Chaotic Startup Life
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Brain Support for roughly two months. During that time I notice more alertness and the ability to concentrate more on the job. I work in a fast-paced, startup office which can be a difficult environment to be productive in. I will continue to monitor my progress but so far, I believe this product is helping me with clarity and focus.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Terry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: MADE ME AND HUBBY VERY DIZZY. I ALMOST FELD ON THE STREET WHILE WALKING HOME... SHIRLEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - Didn't Feel Any Effects
customer_reviews.text: I've taken nootropics in the past that worked (like "Alpha Brain"). This brand did not affect me at all which tells me the source of the compounds (ingredients) is poor or the label is wrong and the doses are not accurate. Alpha Brain worked well for me, but I don't like the cost which is inflated to cover marketing... BUT, that one works. So back to it I go. Anyone know of a good alternative that works but doesn't come with the Alpha Brain price tag?
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hurt
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, it’s hard for me to say anything about their effectiveness, but the list of ingredients is concise and well blended. I purchased to help with general “brain fog” and the reason I say it’s hard for me to attest to their effectiveness is because the placebo effect can be very powerful and I don’t know if that was mainly what was going on. The change wasn’t significant but I did feel better knowing a nootropic formula was at least in my system maybe defragging bits in the background. I used for 45 days pretty regularly, but haven’t purchased again because I have some other supplements I need to get through first. I figure they can’t hurt though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for quite sometime and finally found Body 1. This product includes three Key elements prudent to a good cognitive suppliment. And the ones I didn't know I researched and and they're all important and quite effective. I am glad I found this and I'm sticking with it. U can safely take 3 per. Day, so I do 2 in the morning and a third sometimes in the afternoon. Really helps me think clearly and make smart decisions on these trying times. Thanks Body 1!!!
customer_reviews.author: Investigator

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a brain aneurysm that burst then sealed itself off but left me with headaches and the side of my head feeling weird, I started taking brain support and it has helped really helped I am thankful for this product, brain support, I have tried everything until this, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie, I did complete the review for the free bottle... But I didn't have to copy the review here to Amazon. That said, I love this product! I can really feel a difference in my mental clarity and focus when I take these. I also really like how these don't have caffeine in them, so you get pure focus and brain energy without the caffeine high and crash.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Brain Support
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeling a little foggy upstairs and low on energy. Reading a lot about various herb and how they affect the human body and brain function I found Brain Support had the ingredients that I was looking for. I have been taking Brain Support for 18 days and have been feeling more energetic and no brain fog. I will continue to use 1 Body Brain Support.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie W

customer_reviews.title: Everything - but Not Enough?
customer_reviews.text: You appear to have most of the ingredients mentioned when talking brain support, but the quantities listed for many appear to possibly be too small to have much if any affect in regards to what they are being taken for. This formula may be out-performed by just taking 3-4 primary brain support ingredients in much higher dosages.
customer_reviews.author: fire_fir

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: After researching similar supplements, this one seemed to have the best, unique blend. I am very impressed at how well it works and will continue to buy this supplement. Completely cleared the fog from my apnea/insomnia issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been fairly helpful in terms of my morning alertness. It doesn't seem to have a negative impact on the several Rx meds that I take daily, so I'm optimistic/hopeful that I will be able to continue to use this product for quite awhile. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SJL-Instructor

customer_reviews.title: The product works well. My only concern is that ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. My only concern is that there was no proper seal on the product. Hopefully Brain Support takes care of this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Safwan Ahmed Muneer

customer_reviews.title: Gradual but slow difference
customer_reviews.text: Our 11yr son has trouble focusing and staying on task. We don’t want to go the rx route so we try different supplements. This one hasn’t had a drastic change but he hasn’t been spoken to as much for not completing tasks. He does seem more pleasant however.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Sapp Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excercise your brain
customer_reviews.text: Seems to support an elevated mood with more energy, also seems to allow for increased conversational exchanges. 'Brain Support' has become our 'base-support' in supplement routine! Would like to see an extended release form, if that were possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ovrnite

customer_reviews.title: Energy and Memory Recall Improved
customer_reviews.text: Really helps energy and helps me with short term memory recall. Initially seemed to give me headaches, but I took half the dose for a few days and then the full dose, no headaches. I’ve bought it twice already and makes a huge difference when I’m taking it.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's a pill, you need three to get the appropriate doses, and it seems to sharpen my organizational thinking as well as adding both purpose and creativity. I've experimented a bit, and there seems to be a difference. Also, I've used other products with less success, but this formula is optimal, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: PTMTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Heads Up
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to start your day mentally. By taking this product, I'm able to fully concentrate on the task at hand, all day. No highs or lows, just steady mental alertness, focus and awareness.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: A decent addition
customer_reviews.text: My Mom is taking it and she suffers from mild dementia. I've noticed some mild improvement in her short term memory and she seems very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pawelski

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first, but I noticed laser like focus the very first day I tried it. Not only that, but I'm now able to hear the thoughts of those around me, levitate, and start fires just by focusing my energy. I'll be buying more of this fo sho!
customer_reviews.author: greg kenne

customer_reviews.title: Exciting!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty pumped to find this brain support supplement which included the ingredients I was looking for. Especially at this excellent price! So many things are overpriced these days, so being able to try a product without it costing an arm and a leg was part of the reason I decided to try this. I've been losing words over the past year or so and and happy to give this the time I need to determine whether it really helps me or not. So far I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: One of the few brain supplements I've reordered.
customer_reviews.text: I spend a great deal of time writing and, not long ago, found I had to stop my train of thought to look up words that years ago flowed from synapse to fingertip within a nanosecond. I methodically selected over 20 different brands of supplements proposing to ameliorate the random blanks where words should be. This brand was one of five I have reordered as there is a noticeable drop in the number of times I have to stop to google a word I've known since childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hawks

customer_reviews.title: good component dosages
customer_reviews.text: This is my first brain booster. Before that, I was taking separately some components, such as Ginkgo Biloba, Alpha GPC and Bacopa Monniery. I chose the product because I liked the composition: all the necessary components are included and what is important, here are good dosages, for example in most similar brain supports the dosage of Ginkgo Biloba is only 50 mg, but here 100 mg. I like the effect of the reception Brain Support. At least I can keep a clear mind for a long time during the working day. Let's see how long this effect will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Mental Capacity All Around
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 Body Brain Support supplement capsules and must say that I had a positive experience. I noticed that after taking this supplement for 2 weeks straight, it started doing what it said it would do. I had better mental clarity, I could recall memory thoughts faster, less brain fog, and generally a better mental capacity in all regards. After I ran out, I noticed that the effects wore off within 3 days, so it's something to keep taking to keep the benefits. I will definitely buy more in the future. Thanks for making a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Sky

customer_reviews.title: caused a headache, sleepiness and racing heart beats
customer_reviews.text: Caused headache, sleepiness and racing heartbeats.. I believe, taking pills as is - is dangerous..ingredients are good and well researched.. the mixture and ratios are poor.. I am better off by ordering the ingredients one by one and trying them separately..
customer_reviews.author: marina pletner

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Alpha-glycerylphosphorylcholine is a building block for a neurotransmitter used in the signaling of the central nervous system, acetylcholine, so this product’s rational design makes sense. And there are also studies which show a high therapeutic index for this molecule’s safety, however there are some minor side effects. I suggest for everyone to do their research before they decide on putting a supplement in their body. I have only been using this for three weeks or so. I take it during the day and it helps with my focus and slightly lengthens my attention span. When I take it before I go to bed at night, I definitely notice that my dreams are more vivid and enhanced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difference, but not revolutionary
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a little helpful for "brain fog", but didn't find it to have a very significant effect on my memory/thought process. Was hoping for a more noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: It works as described
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s providing brain support and energy. I take it exactly as prescribed 3 per day usually 2 in the morning and 1 late afternoon. Satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a different type of brain supplement for a while but decided to try 1 Body. I thought the brand I was using before was working pretty well, but when I tried 1 Body's it didn't seem to be any better or worse, so I'll take that as a very good thing. Thanks for a great product! I especially liked the slightly higher levels of Huperzine than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: IH

customer_reviews.title: These supplements dont cure chronic fatigue syndrome
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd nootropics supplement I've tried I'm still having extreme chronic fatigue syndrome none of these supplements help dont waste your $ im seeing a specialist for these conditions soon hopefully depending on cost of treatment I've found numerous clinics in Western Washington I can give websites for anyone who requests them.
customer_reviews.author: jamy haynen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you focused
customer_reviews.text: Recall of names is quicker. Verbal list of tasks given to me (for editing video presentations) are better retained. I can better decide the smarter, more creative way to accomplish these tasks and stay more focused while doing them.
customer_reviews.author: TonyCoach

customer_reviews.title: Suspect Product
customer_reviews.text: I've went through two bottles of this multi nootropic/supplement product. I can't lie and say I don't notice anything -- the effects are very minute and perhaps an placebo. Given everything that's listed and the amounts they are listed as, I know for a fact that the effects should be more pronounced. Because of the aforementioned it's lead of my suspicion that this product is nothing more than Vitamin B complex with other ingredients falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Major headache and sharp pain near my eye after just three tablets. Definitely should be taken off the market.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Adderall
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Great alternative to meds like Adderall and Ritalin. I can definitely concentrate better and my memory has improved bc of these pills!!!!! Thanks a bunch!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gpuppy28

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement to help me focus, as I've been finding myself difficult to concentrate at one point. I feel that it definitely makes a difference - I'm on my third bottle currently and recommended it to my friend, who is under a lot of pressure (she is a full-time student and works part-time).
customer_reviews.author: allakit

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have been taking if for three months now and boy can I tell a difference. As a nurse I recognize how important brain health is to your overall daily function and this product supports that goal 100%. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dahlseid

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult for me to tease out exactly what this product is doing for me as I take several others but I do like it as part of my arsenal as I suffer from depression and and anxiety and have gone off of SSRIs and NDRIs after 25 years. I also take 5-HTP, Theanine, Inositol and ashwaghanda, Omega FAs, and vit d3.
customer_reviews.author: otsuka

customer_reviews.title: Product is very misleading.  Company is suspect
customer_reviews.text: Product claims you receive 1-free bottle. This is incorrect and the website provided simply does not correctly process the free bottle. Additionally, I suspect the pills are significantly under-dosed and not what is specified on the label.
customer_reviews.author: E. Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Positive and lively
customer_reviews.text: It seems to help me stay positive and lively throughout the day, like a cup of coffee without the dehydration. I do think I feel a lag later in the day if I had taken one or two in the morning, and it has kept me up at night if I take another one too late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The price is the first thing that is awesome as I have tried other products that are very pricey. The second thing is I am thrilled with how well my brain is functioning now! The only bad part is taking 3 capsules a day. I do wish the required dose was only 1. But that will not stop me from buying this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: JSBBS

customer_reviews.title: Give this formula time to produce results.  The positive effects seem to be cumulative.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially attracted to this supplement because I was impressed by the choice, combination and mg. strength of the ingredients. It took until the 2nd bottle, but more recently, I definitely see a difference in my ability to recall, more quickly and stay focused with less effort. I highly recommend Brain Support for anyone who has to do a lot of mentally-challenging multi-tasking, which is most of us, these days.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Better brain functioning in several ways
customer_reviews.text: I feel as if my brain functioning, including thinking, concentration and memory, are definitely improved, both as a baseline (e.g. when I wake up in the morning) and at peak effort (sustained focus and effort). Good product and I plan to continue to use it !
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Come out of the Fog!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 51 years old and I started to notice that I was having to really keep a lot of notes. This was happening at work and at home, so I studied many and it came down to 1 Body and another brand. After carefully examining ingredients in both, 1 Body was the better choice and I'm highly please !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mjuli1

customer_reviews.title: Great effective product, very reasonably priced for all that you get.
customer_reviews.text: I definately notice feeling more alert, and have better focus and word access. It was more obvious to me after I finished the one month supply and went without for a week or so. My wife noticed the same positive effects. We were anxiously awaiting the next delivery and will be taking this everyday! Great product and very reasonably priced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the alertness that this gives me to get through the day! I definitely recommend this for anyone with daytime fogginess or trouble focusing!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Very Good product - with essential nootropic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It makes me feel sharper and able to concentrate better. It gives me the mental endurance I need to be motivated to perform my job and make all the important decisions for which I need to devote time and consideration. I have been using this product for for at least 3 months and would recommend it. It also makes me feel sociable which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: RTG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for TBI
customer_reviews.text: I had a traumatic brain Injury 10 months ago. Taking this product helps me think clearer and be more alert. I stopped taking it for about a month, and I noticed a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Brain  support really help me.
customer_reviews.text: I am 63 years old and I bought this product Because I started forgetting things so I started looking for something that had lion mane extract with vitamins in it so I bought brain support and I have used it over 15 days and I have noticed a big difference I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Marezine works great for me.

customer_reviews.title: BRAIN FOG GONE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking “Brain Support” for 1 month & just purchased my 2nd bottle. I love “Brain Support”! It contains all the anti-aging ingredients I’ve been looking for (Rhodiola; L-Theanine; Tyrosine; etc). My brain fog has been eliminated & I feel more alert. I’m not forgetting names or words mid-sentence when talking to people nearly as much as I was prior to taking “Brain Support”. I feel healthier, more confident socially & generally less “old”. I plan to continue taking it for the rest of my life. Thank you:))
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Thaxton

customer_reviews.title: Product actually works!
customer_reviews.text: At first i was very skeptical about taking these type of supplements but to my surprise i actually can feel a difference after taking Brain Support for the past few weeks. I can definitely feel the difference on how better focus I am at work. I feel clear and I actually decrease my coffee intake without feeling cloudy. Definitely works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Feel better, feel focused
customer_reviews.text: Increased alertness, without nervousness. Increased calm and focus. No gastrointestinal upset. I just feel better. I take this at night, and seem to sleep better, but it does not induce drowsiness.
customer_reviews.author: cinnis

customer_reviews.title: Brain fog gone
customer_reviews.text: I feel more clear headed. Brain fog gone. This formula has a unique combination of ingredients. Eat well and drink lots of water, you will be more productive
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: As close as it comes to NZT from the movie "Limitless"
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a supplement that combined Bacopa (shown to increase memory) and Centrophenoxine (slows brain aging), and I found an incredible combination in Brain Support by 1Body. I can already feel my brain processing faster - this is as close as it comes to NZT from the movie "Limitless"
customer_reviews.author: Arkh Industries

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Brain Support is helping me stay alert & attentive all day. My head stays clear and the fatigue (MS related) that has troubled me in the afternoons has ceased. I find it is helping me to get a better nights sleep by improving how soundly I sleep. I feel more rested when I get up in the morning now and am able to think straight right away. Thnx 1 Body!
customer_reviews.author: Stoffer351

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well.
customer_reviews.text: Brain Support seems to be working well for me. I've only been using it for about a week but I like the product. I does help me focus better and it doesn't make me jittery like caffeine or other products I have taken.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: I noticed a change for the better almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a change for the better almost immediately. The memory and not forgetting things were the major differences I felt. I have taken supplements for years and this one filled in all the holes..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Hetland

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients but it gave me a heightened sense of anxiety as well as urinary issues. I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I really feel benefit from this product and like the price point considering the great combined doses of key ingredients recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Tootles

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: As an older billiards player, I found myself sometimes confused when trying to see the pattern to run the balls out on the table. I tried this and I played like when I was in my prime.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Ann

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: ive ordered these for my family and I to take daily as we are getting older we are looking for supplements to help keep our brains sharp, so far it has been working well
customer_reviews.author: Anshirley

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredient profile
customer_reviews.text: As a person who is worried about cognitive decline I have used many different blends of ingredients that should help with numerous mental issues/challenges. The formulation with this product is very impressive. Not just the ingredients but also the dosing. I am about to start my second bottle and so far I haven't really noticed the results that I thought I would. I will see what happens after the second bottle and then decide which way I want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Hopefull

customer_reviews.title: This product is helping me, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My daughter helped me choose this product. I was having "senior moments" of forgetfulness a little more often as the last year went by. While the suggested dosage is 3 capsules, I started out with 1 a day. I noticed a positive healthy difference. Just recently, I upped the dosage to 2 a day during the work week, and have noticed another improvement - greater mental activity and recall. I'm doing more mental multi-tasking now than I have for several years. (I do computer work.) So I really am benefiting from this product. If you buy it, hopefully it will work as well for you too.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Brain Support
customer_reviews.text: I have just started taking Brain Support; however I have found it to improve my memory, it appears to have increased my ability to focus on completing detail-oriented studies/research. In addition, I do believe that my mind performs complicated cognitive processes better.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing a matching game for some time now and have had problems remembering where certain cards were. I now have less problems remembering and are able to finish game before timer goes off.
customer_reviews.author: DAnderson

product_meta.title: Support Healthy Brain Function with Nootropics, Improve Memory and Boost Focus - Alpha GPC, Lion’s Mane Extract, Bacopa Monnieri, Phosphatidylserine, Ginkgo Biloba, Rhodiola Rosea, Huperzine A
feature_bullets: IMPROVE MEMORY & LEARNING - Nourish your mind with brain supplements that promote better recall & memory retention to improve your communication skills, enhance learning & access to memories

ENJOY GREATER FOCUS & CLARITY - Nothing turns you into a pro faster than having better focus concentration and mental clarity to attack your work and studies now without feeling the constant pressure to get distracted
CLINICALLY PROVEN NOOTROPIC INGREDIENTS - Support healthy brain function and peak mental performance. Our formula contains Alpha GPC Bacopa Monnieri Ginkgo Biloba Rhodiola Rosea Huperzine A & more

CLEAN ENERGY & MOOD BOOSTER - Our formula provides clean calm energy with no caffeine or harsh stimulants. Plus we’ve included nutrition to elevate mood & reduce stress by supporting healthy serotonin & dopamine levels

NON-GMO & VEGETARIAN - Our smart brain supplement contains 30 servings of 3 easy-to-swallow pills. Manufactured in the USA at a cGMP facility with NO dairy, gluten, soy, egg, fish, tree nuts, & no artificial colors or flavors
